creator: Henry Charles Lea
description:
LibriVox recording of History of the Inquisition of Spain, Vol. 3 by Henry Charles Lea.
Read in English by volunteer readers.

The 3rd volume of Lea's monumental work on the Spanish Inquisition. This volume covers torture practices; the trial process; punishments; Jews, Moriscos, and Protestants; and censorship. - Summary by Sienna

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;history; Inquisition; spanish inquisition; trials; punishments
